name: Paris
description: The capital city of France, known for its art, fashion, and culture.

name: Grand Canyon
description: A massive canyon in Arizona, USA, known for its stunning landscapes and geological formations.

name: Tokyo
description: The bustling capital of Japan, famous for its skyscrapers, shopping, and rich history.

name: Great Wall of China
description: An ancient series of walls and fortifications in northern China, built to protect against invasions.

name: Machu Picchu
description: A 15th-century Inca citadel located in the Andes mountains of Peru.

name: Sydney
description: A vibrant city in Australia known for its iconic Sydney Opera House and Harbour Bridge.

name: Santorini
description: A picturesque island in Greece known for its white-washed buildings and stunning sunsets.

name: Serengeti National Park
description: A large national park in Tanzania, famous for its annual migration of wildebeest and zebras.

name: Venice
description: A unique city in Italy known for its canals, historic buildings, and romantic gondola rides.

name: Niagara Falls
description: A group of three waterfalls at the border between the United States and Canada, known for its breathtaking views.

name: Mount Everest
description: The highest mountain in the world, located in the Himalayas on the border between Nepal and China.

name: Dubai
description: A modern city in the UAE known for its luxurious lifestyle, skyscrapers, and the Burj Khalifa.

name: Rome
description: The capital of Italy, famous for its ancient history, including landmarks like the Colosseum and the Vatican.

name: Galápagos Islands
description: An archipelago of volcanic origin in the Pacific Ocean, known for its unique wildlife and natural beauty.

name: Kyoto
description: A city in Japan known for its classical Buddhist temples, gardens, and traditional wooden houses.

name: Iguazu Falls
description: A massive waterfall system located on the border between Argentina and Brazil, known for its spectacular views.

name: Cairo
description: The capital city of Egypt, known for its rich history including the nearby pyramids of Giza.

name: Dubai Desert
description: A vast desert surrounding Dubai, offering stunning dunes and camel rides.

name: Petra
description: An ancient city in Jordan, renowned for its rock-cut architecture and water conduit system.
